original_text: The next day we put in at Sidon. And Julius treated Paul kindly and gave him leave to go to his friends and be cared for.
korean_text: 이튿날 시돈에 대니 율리오가 바울을 친절히 대하여 친구들에게 가서 대접 받기를 허락하더니

sentences.original_text: The next day we put in at Sidon.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 다음 날 우리는 시돈에 들렀습니다.

sentences.original_text: and gave him leave to go to his friends
